title: Invincible Double Treasure: Super Awesome Tsundere Mommy - Novel Updates
tags: Childcare   Cute Children   Female Protagonist   Single Parent
author: 菟丝子
description:
She suffered under the trap set by her father and step-sister. She was sent as a present to an old and ugly man. Unexpectedly she had given birth to a pair of Dragon and Phoenix with the “Three Highs” – outstanding looks, high IQ, and high EQ! She was afraid that her Children would be snatched away by that old man. She changed her name to hide in Tibet, but the pair of Meng Bao* brought back an aristocratic Man. She looks at the man in front of her, who looks like her son. Ye Xinbai still hadn’t spoken when the man grabbed her waist…

*Meng Bao : Cute Treasure>
